constituent: England, flowers, centre, center, large, St. Bernard
heisigStory: Flowers . . . center. This is another abbreviation used to identify a country by the pronunciation of the kanji.
koohiiStory1: The original great seal of the king of England had a very ornate flower in the center.
koohiiStory2: England is a country where people think they´re the flower at the center of the world. (a description that would fit China much better.. 中華).
words:
英字(えいじ): English letter (character)
英雄(えいゆう): hero, great man
英文(えいぶん): sentence in English
英和(えいわ): English-Japanese (e.g. dictionary)
和英(わえい): Japanese-English
英語(えいご): the English language
